title: XDM Business Opportunity Person Relation
description: XDM Business Opportunity Person Relation is a standard Experience Data Model (XDM) class that captures the minimum required properties of a person that is associated with a business opportunity. This XDM class can only be included in the profile for customers with the B2B or B2P Edition.

xdm:opportunityPersonID.title: Opportunity Person ID
xdm:opportunityPersonID.description: Unique identifier for the relationship between the opportunity and the person.

xdm:opportunityPersonKey.title: Opportunity Person Key
xdm:opportunityPersonKey.description: Unique composite identifier of the relationship between the Opportunity and the Person.

xdm:opportunityID.title: Opportunity ID
xdm:opportunityID.description: Unique identifier for the opportunity in this opportunity person relationship.

xdm:opportunityKey.title: Opportunity Key
xdm:opportunityKey.description: Unique composite identifier of the Opportunity in this opportunity person relationship.

xdm:personID.title: Person ID
xdm:personID.description: Unique identifier for the person in this opportunity person relationship.

xdm:personKey.title: Person Key
xdm:personKey.description: Unique composite identifier of the Person related to the Opportunity.

xdm:personRole.title: Person Role
xdm:personRole.description: Role of the person on this opportunity.

xdm:isPrimary.title: Primary Flag
xdm:isPrimary.description: Boolean indicating if the person is the primary contact on this opportunity.
